sentences.en: He moved to New York and performed an untraditional roster of penniless actor jobs – yoga instructor, manure shoveller, railroad-loader.
sentences.cn: 他搬到纽约，成为一名一贫如洗的演员，他的工作表上有许多非传统工作——教瑜伽、铲肥料、铺铁路。

sentences.en: Instead, he was distracted with other untraditional challenges, such as bettering the gods.
sentences.cn: 结果他却被另外一些非传统的难题弄得头疼, 比如说对神的改良.

sentences.en: So what did Ellen's family think of this untraditional celebration? This is her aunt.
sentences.cn: 那么什么艾伦的家人认为这非传统的庆祝活动？这是她的姑姑。

trans.tran_cn: 非传统的,不符合传统的
